compliant.section: This privacy policy applies to the collection, processing, use and protection of personal data involved in your use of this company's website (hereinafter referred to as "this website"), but does not apply to other agency websites linked to the functions of this website, nor does it apply to personnel not entrusted or involved in the management of this website.
本網站會記錄使用者上站的 IP 位址、上網時間以及在本網站內所瀏覽的網頁等資料，這些資料係供本網站管理單位內部作網站流量和網路行為調查的總量分析，以利於提昇本網站的服務品質，且本僅對全體使用者行為總和進行分析，並不會對個別使用者進行分析。
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization, Purpose limitation, Lawfulness of processing - legitimate interests (improving service quality)

compliant.section: 本公司絕不會任意出售、交換、或出租任何您的個人資料給其他團體、個人或私人企業。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - contract, Principles relating to processing of personal data

compliant.section:
但有下列情形者除外：
a. 配合司法單位合法的調查。
b. 配合相關職權機關依職務需要之調查或使用。
c. 基於善意相信揭露為法律需要，或為維護和改進網站服務而用於管理。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - legal obligation, legitimate interests (preventing fraud, ensuring security)

compliant.section: 本公司將會不時修訂本隱私權政策，修正後的條款將刊登於本網站公告。建議您不定期造訪本公司網站，瀏覽最新的隱私權政策，以了解其相關內容。
compliant.legal provisions: Users should be informed of changes to the privacy policy in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language. This can be achieved by highlighting the changes or providing a summary of the changes.

non_compliant.section: This website will not collect any personal data for simply browsing and downloading files on this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent,  freely given consent
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that the website does not use tracking cookies or similar technologies that could be considered personal data. If such technologies are used, explicit consent must be obtained in line with GDPR requirements.

non_compliant.section: When using the contact mailbox of this website, applying to be a member or for various services, when the applicant is required to provide personal data, you will be asked to provide your name, contact number, e-mail, contact address and other latest and most authentic personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the exact data collected for each purpose (contact mailbox, membership, services) and justify why this data is necessary. State how long the data will be stored and the criteria for determining the storage period.

non_compliant.section: The personal data collected by this website from you will be used for customer management, marketing and related services within the business scope required by this company.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, conditions for consent, right to object
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for processing personal data for each purpose (customer management, marketing). If relying on consent, ensure that it is freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. Provide users with the option to opt-out of marketing communications and clearly explain how to do so.

non_compliant.section: 本公司僅在中華民國境內利用您的個人資料。
non_compliant.amend: GDPR applies to data controllers and processors outside the EU if they process personal data of EU residents.  The policy should clarify whether it processes data of EU residents and comply with GDPR requirements regardless of data processing location.

non_compliant.section: 您於本網站所輸入的個人資料，除由您以書面通知刪除，或法令另有規定外，將因應前述蒐集目的永久保存。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: Data should be stored only as long as necessary for the specified purposes. The policy should specify retention periods and provide for data deletion or anonymization afterwards. Users should also have the right to request deletion without undue delay, unless legal exceptions apply.

non_compliant.section:
本網站所蒐集個人資料之當事人，依個人資料保護法得對本公司行使以下權利：
a. 查詢或請求閱覽。
b. 請求製給複製本。
c. 請求補充或更正。
d. 請求停止蒐集、處理或利用。
e. 請求刪除。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Chapter III - Rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly mention all data subject rights under GDPR, including: right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, object to processing, not be subject to automated decision-making. It should also provide clear and accessible procedures for exercising these rights.

non_compliant.section:
會員如欲行使上述權利，得隨時以電子郵件通知聯絡信箱:
李名田先生vincent.lee2@tsecpv.com
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Responsibility of the controller
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide a clear and easily accessible way for data subjects to contact the controller, including a postal address. Relying solely on email might not be sufficient. It should also specify the controller's identity and contact details.

non_compliant.section: 非經本公司事先書面許可，本網站上之資料(包括但不限於本公司商標、文字、圖片等)不得以任何方式複製、使用。本公司於本網站內提供之任何資訊，皆不得視為本公司已將任何智慧財產權(包括專利、商標、著作權、營業秘密、以及其他任何無體財產權)授權給您。
non_compliant.amend: This section is about intellectual property rights and does not relate to GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The privacy policy should be easily accessible and available at all times. It is not sufficient to simply have a link to the policy.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a comprehensive privacy policy that covers all data processing activities, including the legal basis for processing, data retention periods, and data subject rights.

non_compliant.section:
© Copyright 2015 TSEC Corporation.
All Rights Reserved
non_compliant.amend: This section is about copyright and does not relate to GDPR compliance.
